alert.note: Alert for Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 9:14AM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Sleet accumulations less than half an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, northeast and northern Maryland and northern and northwest Virginia. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light mixed precipitation may occur at times today, but the greater risk for hazardous travel will come from freezing rain tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
